name: What Happened in the Woods (Alpha)
description:
Disclaimer: Game is still in development, so some features might feel lacking or might be missing entirely. Feedback is much appreciated!

What Happened in the Woods is a randomized, story-based, experimental horror game about exploring a haunted forest. Find all five notes to survive, or die trying!

Game Highlights:

-Explore a randomized haunted forest

-Fight a demon boss

-Ending plot twist

-Weekly Updates

Menu Controls:

W and S/Up and Down arrows - Navigate Menus

Space - Select

Controls:

AWSD - Move

Right Click - Switch Weapon

Left Click - Use Weapon

E - Pickup

Shift - Sprint
